      • saveConfigurations

        public Status saveConfigurations()
        Description copied from interface: IConfigurationServiceCommon
        Represent the trigger to save the controller configuration cluster wide. When called on IConfigurationService, it will trigger a cluster wide save configuration event for all the global instance components and all components in all containers. When called on IContainerConfigurationService, it will trigger a cluster wide save configuration event for all components in the current container.
        Specified by:
        saveConfigurations in interface IConfigurationServiceCommon
        Returns:
        the Status object representing the result of the saving request

      • entryCreated

        public void entryCreated(java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheUpdateAware
        Invoked when a new entry is available in the cache, the key is only provided, the value will come as an entryUpdate invocation
        Specified by:
        entryCreated in interface ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the entry just created
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node

      • entryUpdated

        public void entryUpdated(java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.String new_value,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheUpdateAware
        Called anytime a given entry is updated
        Specified by:
        entryUpdated in interface ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the entry modified
        new_value - the new value the key will have
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node

      • entryDeleted

        public void entryDeleted(java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheUpdateAware
        Called anytime a given key is removed from the ConcurrentHashMap we are listening to.
        Specified by:
        entryDeleted in interface ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the entry removed
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node

      • persistConfiguration

        public Status persistConfiguration(java.util.List<ConfigurationObject> config,
                          java.lang.String fileName)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigurationServiceCommon
        Bundle will call this function to ask Configuration Manager to persist their configurations. It is up to the Configuration Manager to decide how the configuration will be persisted
        Specified by:
        persistConfiguration in interface IConfigurationServiceCommon
        Parameters:
        config - The bundle configuration as a collection of ConfigurationObject
        fileName - The identifier for this configuration
        Returns:
        The Status of the operation

      • retrieveConfiguration

        public java.util.List<ConfigurationObject> retrieveConfiguration(IObjectReader reader,
                                                        java.lang.String fileName)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigurationServiceCommon
        Bundle will call this function to ask Configuration Manager to retrieve the configuration identified by the passed store name
        Specified by:
        retrieveConfiguration in interface IConfigurationServiceCommon
        Parameters:
        reader - The reader object for parsing the configuration provided by the caller
        fileName - The identifier for the configuration
        Returns:
        The retrieved configuration as a collection of ConfigurationObject
